experiment_name: Design and Evolution of an Enzyme for the Asymmetric Michael Addition of Cyclic Ketones to Nitroolefins by Enamine Catalysis
additional_information: reaction_condition: reaction_temperature:20°C;    reaction_ph:7.0;    reaction_other_conditions:2.5 mol% (25 μM) LmrR_Cys_THP, 24 h, 5% v/v DMF;    reaction_substrate_concentration:40 mM 1a, 1 mM 2a
